description.narrative: Innovative teaching and learning and teacher training models developed and demonstrated to inform national professional standards and training programmes and implementation of national plans [GoC National Educational Informatization Plan], especially in the most disadvantaged areas., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children in China aged 6 to 18 years, particularly the most vulnerable, have improved equitable access to and complete child-friendly learning and â€œsuzhi jiaoyuâ€ oriented education.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Innovative teaching and learning and teacher training models developed and demonstrated to inform national professional standardsand training programmes and implementation of national plans [GoC National Educational Informatization Plan], especially in themost disadvantaged areas.

description.narrative: UNICEF’s work on innovative teaching and learning progressed as planned in 2020, with key results achieved in: (1) further strengthening of the innovative teaching and learning and teacher training models piloted in selected counties; (2) resource package developed and adapted to support teacher training, as well as knowledge and experience sharing; (3) evidence-based policy advocacy and innovative approaches adopted for scale-up. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:01/02/2021

title.narrative: Interactive, inclusive and innovative models and strategies for classroom teaching with ICT support developed and implemented(45302)

baseline.value: Models and strategies not yet developed

target.value: 2020:A workable training resource package finalized to support innovative teaching and learning in rural schools

actual.value: 2020:The innovative teaching and learning manual for teachers was finalized and shared, and serves as a guiding material and documentation of programme experiences.
